thread.title: MusicNews | Watch: One Direction release official music video for Perfect... Deffo about Taylor Swift
thread.title_full: MusicNews | Watch: One Direction release official music video for Perfect... Deffo about Taylor Swift - entertainment.ie

author: Sheena McGinley
title: MusicNews | Watch: One Direction release official music video for Perfect... Deffo about Taylor Swift
text:
They may have cancelled last night's Belfast gig at the last minute , but this should more than make up for it, right? No?
There had been rumblings that the song is CLEARLY about Taylor Swift , given the proliferation of lyrics such as "I might never be your knight in shining armor/ I might never be the one who you take home to mother/And I might never be the one who brings you flowers/But I can be the one tonight."
As if that weren't enough, the camera cuts away to Harry at the most telling line: "And if you like cameras flashing every time we go out / And if you’re looking for someone to write your breakup songs about / Baby, I’m perfect / Baby, we’re perfect".
Oh and it's set in New York. Nuff said.
